SQL_STMT_U.val:
select distinct H.NUMERATOR from A_HALVAOT H Join A_TASHLUMIM T on T.NUMERATOR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR JOIN ( SELECT SA.Numerator ,SA.Status_Code FROM HALVAA_Status_Audit SA WHERE SA.Change_Datetime = ( SELECT max(SA1.Change_Datetime) FROM HALVAA_Status_Audit SA1 WHERE SA1.Numerator = SA.Numerator AND SA1.Change_Datetime <= ':3' ) ) AS StatusHistory ON StatusHistory.Numerator = H.NUMERATOR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SA.Numerator ,SA.Status_Hov_Code FROM HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit SA WHERE SA.Change_Datetime = ( SELECT max(SA1.Change_Datetime) FROM HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit SA1 WHERE SA1.Numerator = SA.Numerator AND SA1.Change_Datetime <= ':3' ) ) AS StatusHovHistory ON StatusHovHistory.Numerator = H.NUMERATOR
where DATE_METUCHNAN between ':1' and ':2' and H.HALVAA_DATE<>'00000000' AND StatusHistory.Status_Code NOT IN (:4) AND (StatusHovHistory.Status_Hov_Code<>90 or StatusHovHistory.Status_Hov_Code is null) AND (select sum(M.SUM_SHACH) from A_HAMCHAOT M where M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and M.TAARICH_ERECH<=':2') <>0

select distinct H.NUMERATOR from A_HALVAOT H where H.HALVAA_DATE<>'00000000' and H.HALVAA_DATE<=':1' and LUACH_HECHZERIM_HISTORY_1=0 and not exists (select 1 from A_TASHLUMIM T where T.NUMERATOR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and DATE_METUCHNAN<=':1') and exists (select 1 from A_TASHLUMIM T where T.NUMERATOR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR ) and (select sum(M.SUM_SHACH) from A_HAMCHAOT M where M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and M.TAARICH_ERECH<=':1') >0

SELECT DISTINCT HA.Numerator FROM HALVAA_Status_Audit HA JOIN A_HALVAOT H ON H.NUMERATOR = HA.Numerator JOIN BOI_CR_Control C on C.BOI_CR_Control_Id=1 --JOIN A_HAMCHAOT M on M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR WHERE month(Change_Datetime) = :1 AND year(Change_Datetime)=:3 --AND M.TAARICH_ERECH <> '00000000' AND M.TAARICH_ERECH <= ':2' AND (H.HALVAA_DATE>':4' or C.Min_Loan_Date_For_Include is null) AND (select sum(M.SUM_SHACH) from A_HAMCHAOT M where M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and M.TAARICH_ERECH<=':2') <>0 and isnull ((select s.Status_Hov_Code from HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit s where s.Numerator=HA.Numerator and s.Change_Datetime = (select max(s1.Change_Datetime) from HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit s1 where s1.Numerator=s.Numerator and s1.Change_Datetime<=':5') ),0)<>90

SELECT DISTINCT HA.Numerator FROM HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit HA JOIN A_HALVAOT H ON H.NUMERATOR = HA.Numerator JOIN BOI_CR_Control C on C.BOI_CR_Control_Id=1 WHERE month(Change_Datetime) = :1 AND year(Change_Datetime)=:3 AND (H.HALVAA_DATE>':4' or C.Min_Loan_Date_For_Include is null) AND (select sum(M.SUM_SHACH) from A_HAMCHAOT M where M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and M.TAARICH_ERECH<=':2') <>0

SELECT distinct H.NUMERATOR FROM A_HALVAOT H JOIN ( SELECT T.NUMERATOR_TIK ,sum(T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT) AS Amount_Owed ,sum(CASE WHEN T.STATUS_TASHLUM IN ( 5 ,6 ,7 ) THEN T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT ELSE 0 END) AS Amount_Paid FROM A_TASHLUMIM T GROUP BY T.NUMERATOR_TIK ) S ON S.NUMERATOR_TIK = H.NUMERATOR JOIN ( SELECT SA.Numerator ,SA.Status_Code FROM HALVAA_Status_Audit SA WHERE SA.Change_Datetime = ( SELECT max(SA1.Change_Datetime) FROM HALVAA_Status_Audit SA1 WHERE SA1.Numerator = SA.Numerator AND SA1.Change_Datetime <= ':5' ) ) AS StatusHistory ON StatusHistory.Numerator = H.NUMERATOR LEFT JOIN ( SELECT HA.Numerator ,HA.Status_Hov_Code FROM HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit HA WHERE HA.Change_Datetime = ( SELECT max(HA1.Change_Datetime) FROM HALVAA_Status_Hov_Audit HA1 WHERE HA1.Numerator = HA.Numerator AND HA1.Change_Datetime <= ':5' ) ) AS StatusHOVHistory ON StatusHOVHistory.Numerator = H.NUMERATOR
WHERE S.Amount_Owed - S.Amount_Paid > 0 AND ( H.HALVAA_DATE > ':1' OR :2 ) AND StatusHistory.Status_Code NOT IN (:3) AND (select sum(M.SUM_SHACH) from A_HAMCHAOT M where M.MISPAR_TIK=H.NUMERATOR and M.TAARICH_ERECH<=':4') <>0 AND (StatusHOVHistory.Status_Hov_Code is null or StatusHOVHistory.Status_Hov_Code<>90)

Header.Description: הלוואות עם מחילת חוב בחודש ד
